bibl.title: ΒΑΛΑΑΚ in the P72 Text of Jude 11: A Proposal. Avec résumé en anglais.
bibl.note: Previous explanations of the "Balaak" reading in Jude 11. - Balaam "rehabilitated". - "Balaak" in Jude 11 and theological tendencies in P72 [= P. Bodmer VII (= van Haelst 557; LDAB 2565)]. - Conclusion.
bibl.seg: Caulley Thomas Scott, ΒΑΛΑΑΚ in the P72 Text of Jude 11: A Proposal. Avec résumé en anglais.

Previous explanations of the "Balaak" reading in Jude 11. - Balaam "rehabilitated". - "Balaak" in Jude 11 and theological tendencies in P72 [= P. Bodmer VII (= van Haelst 557; LDAB 2565)]. - Conclusion.
